remarks: The covers relation is not transitive.  ( ~ cvntr analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lcvnbtwn.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lcvnbtwn.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.
lcvnbtwn.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
lcvnbtwn.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. S ) $.
lcvnbtwn.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
lcvnbtwn.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lcvnbtwn.d $e |- ( ph -> R C T ) $.
lcvntr.p $e |- ( ph -> T C U ) $.
lcvntr $p |- ( ph -> -. R C U ) $.
